text: “Egh dughiabar zurara namba 3ɨn azenibar, nɨn azenibar otivir dagheba, nɨ da abɨgh, 10plan pozibav kɨnigh. Egh pozir vamɨra isɨ Livaiba, ko ikɨzir igharazibar gumazamizir ian tongɨn itiba, ko borir afeziaba ovengeziba, ko amizir paba ovengeziba, nɨ me danɨngigh. Nɨ kamaghɨn damightɨ, nɨn nguibamɨn itir gumazamizir kaba, dagheba izɨvagham.
